user.title: Choose a name for the Presence Simulator instance
user.description: Pick a name for this instance. You can run several instances of Presence Simulator!

init.title: Presence Simulator options
init.description: All settings for the Presence Simulator component. Option names correspond with YAML settings. No options are shown if you have the presence_simulator entry defined in your YAML configuration.

data.automations: automations: select all automations which shall be simulated
data.lights: lights: select all lights which shall be simulated
data.playback_automation: playback_automation - Shall past automations be played back
data.playback_days: playback_days - which day in the past shall be re-played, normally 7 = same day from previous week
data.automation_filter: automation_filter - which character need to exist in automation message e.g. mqtt - use None to whipe

error.entity_missing: One or more selected entities are missing in Home Assistant
